website_summaries.verdict: Despite being a simple non-electric model, it's a total bargain given its multiple temperature settings and dual nozzles.
pros: Unlike other options, this seat blends easily with most standard toilets
Front and rear nozzles are a pleasant surprise at this price
Consumers rave about the quick installation, which takes less than 30 minutes
Eco-friendly heated water stream comes from existing hot water line
cons: Since you can't see the dials from the seated position, you'll need to learn which way to turn them blindly

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product lasted less than 2 months before not working. The first thing I noticed is that the jets are stationary and it does not have a wand that comes out. Because of that it's not nearly as precise or effective as the GenieBidet I have that is also a built-in bidet into the toilet seat. Right at the 1.5 month mark it is not working. Just gurgles water out the jets. I'm past the return window, so there goes $100 down the drain. I should have stuck with GenieBidet. Would not recommend due to the mechanics of it and the short lifespan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool water wash not a problem
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the ambient temp eco-seat as a gift for my in-laws who don't have a power supply or hot water line near their toilet. My wife and I are also leery of the heated water tanks on other models (seems like they could be potential breeding grounds for slime and bacteria). We were skeptical of reviews claiming the cool water was a non-issue, but to our surprise, it's true. We currently have snow/freezing temps, and all four adults who have used the bidet agree that the cool water wash is no problem at all. Installation was a breeze. All that's left to do now is order one for ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: My handy man finally worked me into his schedule to install bidet. As soon as he opened the package it came apart. Nuts/bolts were rattling around inside. After working to try to put it back together for several minutes he gave up. Thinking this is a defective item, and may cause trouble in the future. DON’t waste your money. I lost all I paid as it was too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seat does not stay up
customer_reviews.text: Overall, works as designed, easy to install. However the seat (not the cover) does not stay up. I have not figured out how to adjust this, but it is highly annoying (for the guys in the house).
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Adams

customer_reviews.title: Blending hot water makes it sweet.....
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had is for approximately two months, I can’t believe how well it works. The one thing I had to do is tie the hot water into the toilet water feed with a valve that could adjust how much hot water was blending into the cold water. Having just cold water feeding the sprayer makes for a really chilling experience. I barely have the hot water valve turned on, to make a big difference in comfort. I’ve had this for 6 months now and still loving it a great product. I still can’t get my wife to use it. We’re saving half of our tp usage. It’s nice to feel clean all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: Ready for the next mass hysteria
customer_reviews.text: We had been thinking of getting a bidet for about a year when the pandemic hit. With the unstable supply of toilet paper in March, the time was right. Installation was fairly simple, and it did its job by cutting our TP use down to less than half! The soft close feature stopped working after only a couple weeks, and the front sprayer is aimed too far back while the rear is a little too far forward (so they basically spray the same place). So you have to scoot around to get it where you want it, but it otherwise gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: B.B.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bidet for 3 months. It has converted me. I will never again be without one. I can't say this one is the best, as it is the first and only one I've used. I can say that the seat is comfortable, it seems to be well-built, and it was easy to install. We don't have electrical near our toilet, so I got this one that has no heat. I've yet to see how that feels in the winter. If this product lasts with no issues, I will come back to increase my rating to five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Bad product !
customer_reviews.text: I returned mine. It kept on leaking and I just couldn’t deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skirted Toilet worked out ok, does the job.
customer_reviews.text: It has everything you could want and is discreet. Works just fine and has the option for hot water. I have a skirted toilet and although it was harder to install because of that, the installer was able to figure it out. I do agree with other reviews that say the seat does not always stay up for men’s use. I have not heard a complaint from the husband so I’m going to keep my mouth shut. Haha Important also that you can ‘clean’ the line out by running the water before it cleans you.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ferrari

customer_reviews.title: There's a learning curve
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a cheaper version that tended to splash around water too much with this unit. This works much better and the over spray is reduced greatly, aim is perfect. You will need to learn how to flow through the control properly, in the "clean" cycle, it tends to get a bit of spray everywhere, but then you move quickly to the "spray" cycle and that's what cleans your bottom, works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: thinkaboutit

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Became interested in Bedets while vacationing in Europe. So after reading a ton of reviews on various toilet seat Bedets I chose this one. Non-electric so no extensions cords needed....we live in Florida....tap water is usually Luke warm. WE love this product. My husband says it was easy to install and it works beautifully. The toilet seat itself is well made and sturdy.....It has three settings for the water spray and the only complaint I have is it needs an air blower to dry your bottom! Still need to dry yourself after using....very happy we purchased this...cleanliness is next to godliness is absolutely true
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Simoneau

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and good construction
customer_reviews.text: Good quality material. Long connection between the bidet and the tank( preferably shorter. The jet of water strong and some what anterior to the intended area
customer_reviews.author: S. Farra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: Obviously, this bidet seat will not perform as well as some of the more expensive models, but I have been more than satisfied with it. The spray can be a bit more... aggressive(?) than some I've used, with splash onto sides of the bowl and part of the seat. But none of the water escapes the actual toilet. At <$100, I would recommend this seat wholeheartedly.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott P

customer_reviews.title: Try it. Splurge on a blower, saves toilet paper.
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a bidet but no room in my bathroom. Saw this snd did some research. I love it. Even though the water is not hooked up to water at the sink, it is not too cold on the private parts of the body! I now regret not getting the bidet with a fan to blow you dry. I think that would have made it perfect. Still I like it very much and do recommend it. Plus I thought the price was very fair.Try
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a remote control nor is mine soft.. Not sure why that was an option to review.. Anyways. Very easy to install. When they say. Dont over tighten believe it but watch out we under tighening because we soaked the floor first 5 mins of use lol.. But we tightened again its fine now.. We needed more plumbers tape than was given but we had some on hand.. Be careful with the hot water lmao... Other than that it is a wonderful product.. And I give this 10 stars.
customer_reviews.author: CLPV2020

customer_reviews.title: It's a game changer
customer_reviews.text: With the ongoing Covid-19 pandemic and ongoing shortage of toilet paper, I knew I needed to find a better more sustainable way. My one son has a bidet toilet seat at his apartment and highly recommended it. You can get ones that have heated seats and light up and other things, but they are really not needed. I did not hook it up to the hot water line and only use "room temperature". And that is not uncomfortable. Even after this pandemic is over and toilet paper miraculously appears in the stores, this is a good deal. I use far less toilet paper which is better for the environment
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try a bidet, but the flimsy $30 add-ons whose controls stick out the side seemed like begging to be broken off, but I didn't want to spend $400 for a fancy electric bidet seat. Also, I live in Florida so no need to worry about heating cold water in the winter. The model S101 was only $79, which includes dual (front+back) nozzles and variable pressure control. Installed without leaks first-attempt. (Be sure to use the included teflon tape.) The wife and I agree that we should have gotten one of these years/decades ago.
customer_reviews.author: David in Gainesville

customer_reviews.title: I think it has spoiled my whole family.🤐
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two different brands. Both work well. Brandell swash is the better one. The sturdy easy use controls and self cleaning dual nozzles make this a great choice. And cleans you very well. Now we use almost no toilet paper. You know what they say. Once you Bidet, you never go back.🤣 I waited a while before reviewing this Bidet. I thought the seat would be messy and even onto the floor. But it’s very clean and easy to keep clean. I am very impressed. And now I wouldn’t even consider sitting on a public toilet. I think it has spoiled my whole family.🤐
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: When Life Takes Your Toilet Paper...
customer_reviews.text: With the current run on bathroom tissue, we decided the time was right to take our son’s advice and jun the bidet posse. We purchased a mode with the warm water option. Installation was a little difficult, and would have been simple had the instructions been a bit clearer. That being said, this is a life altering product. I’ve used less than half the TP I’d normally use, and now I can feel refreshed...back there. This Brindel bidet is an absolute must for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long?
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered a attachable bidet to fit under my existing toilet seat from another manufacture that was recommended by a friend. It did not meet my expectation and was poorly designed so I requested a refund from Amazon and ordered the Brondell Swash Non-Electric Seat. It is amazing! The water pressure is just right and I like the self-cleaning feature. I will probably order another one for my front bathroom. My only disappointment is that it does not come with a T-adapter that has a shut off valve (for when the grand kids come to visit). I ordered the valve separately. This is a must have item!
customer_reviews.author: Dink1969

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product and was easy to install. Took about 35 minutes following pretty straight forward instructions and had no leaks. Need to adjust seating position a little to hit the bullseye and all seems to work as described as you adjust the pressure with the knob by how far you turn it.
customer_reviews.author: jasper

customer_reviews.title: Clean design that works great
customer_reviews.text: Prior to purchasing the Brondell Swash Ecoseat, I’ve always used add-on bidets. While add-ons do the job, the Ecoseat has a much cleaner appearance. The single knob operation prevents accidental activation and is easy to access. When turning the knob, it has a responsive click to indicate when the water is off. Water pressure is equivalent to the add-on models. I plan to purchase additional units for each toilet in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Rickeroni

customer_reviews.title: Ol' faithful
customer_reviews.text: My first bidet purchase and boy am I happy with it. I've had it for close to a month now and no complaints. Installation was cake. Simple, easy to follow instructions. I'll admit that I was worried about this purchase solely because I have a very small toilet. I'm pretty sure this thing isn't even on all the way. But it's sturdy and isn't going anywhere. The opening is plenty big for a man and all his parts. The pressure is adjustable and boy is there some pressure behind this little nossel. I would recommend this to anyone interested in entering the world of bidets.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Conley

customer_reviews.title: Cleans really well.
customer_reviews.text: We got this to replace an under the seat bidet that was hard to clean. So far this one is way better. I like the two separate sprayers for front vs back and the self-cleaning feature. The seat was easy to set up and this bidet cleans much better than our last one. My only issue is that both sprayers are angled to clean the same area. It would have been nice if the front sprayer was angled in front of where the back sprayer aims.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany E Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Buy now! You'll love it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a cheaper bidet and regretted it immediately. So I returned that one and ordered this one. I'm so glad I did! I love the soft close lid and how the water hits in just the right spot. The seat does creak as mentioned in other reviews but this doesn't bother me and is a quiet creaking sound anyway. My only complaint is that the wand sometimes does not retract as my water pressure is quite high, but this is manageable so I'm still giving it 5 stars. This bidet is luxury at a great rate!
customer_reviews.author: Hezekiah Laronda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unit for the value
customer_reviews.text: Works great, was easy to install, and overall much better than expected. Only complaint is that the temperature dial is a little wonky; the shift from hot to cold is very abrupt, but unsure how much of that is due to the water lines themselves. I guess additionally, the plastic mounting bolts that attach the lid to the toilet itself are very soft and easy to damage, so be extra careful on installing them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Objective

customer_reviews.title: Functions well and durable
customer_reviews.text: I like the slow motion drop of the lids with no noise. Works great and I would never give it up, it is sooo good! There is a "learning curve", so if you've never used a bidet before, be cautious as it can wet your whole bathroom if not careful! It is a bit pricey, but a sold unit giving no trouble after several months of use. I can recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: bblue

customer_reviews.title: Excellant
customer_reviews.text: The seat design is clever. It cleans itself before and after each use. Turn forward for front wash, turn backwards for back wash . The spray nozzles are tucked away nicely until used. The seat looks much like a normal toilet seat without any tacky dials sticking out. This feature in particular is great for kids; they are less likely to mess with the dial.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Ohhh, the humanity!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these because all the stray dogs in the neighborhood kept barking at my wifes shorts as she walked down the street. I was running out of dog treats trying to keep them away. The first time my wife used this, I thought her eyeballs were going to suck inside her head. She said it felt like Brad Pitt was reaching up out of the bowl, rock and rolling her hoochie coo. This gadget is a wonderment. She quit smoking cools, drinking fauty ouncers and hoenig. I give this a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Dick Goezinya

customer_reviews.title: Basic but solid bidet seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great basic bidet seat. I bought this a couple weeks into COVID when I could not get toilet paper ANYWHERE!!!!!! For 2 months!!!!?‽? Although it’s no frills I am very happy with my purchase. I have traveled quite a bit in Europe where bidets are standard in your hotel room. Don’t understand why they have not caught on in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for my disability use!
customer_reviews.text: Well made with quality fittings. We chose the elongated version: fits well. My husband installed it in less than thirty minutes. Like the retractable self cleaning nozzles. The easy to use control knob adjusted the water spray hitting the spots front and posterior, leaving me feeling fresh and clean. Didn't need the heated water versions as we live in a hot area. Slow closing seats are a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Fading Actress

customer_reviews.title: Faulty, sprays super hard directly at toilet bowl, splattering
customer_reviews.text: Mine is faulty, sprays super hard at toilet bowl, splashing the contents of the toilet bowl back at your under side, yuck! Glad I tested it before sitting on it. Given the product rating I wondering if other people have had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream!
customer_reviews.text: I've only have the bidet seat for a couple of days now. I've always wanted a bidet and this one works perfectly for me. So far no leaks, easy operation and installation--no tools required, and best yet, no electricity connection needed or batteries. I'm happy with the cold tap water temperature. Granted I live in a warm climate, not sure how a winter where it snows would fair. Consider me a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Buttrey

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to install, easy to use, and effective at its job!. The one glitch with installation was that a day after the initial installation there was some water leakage from the connection to the T-line. But it was easily fixed by re-assembling and using the including teflon plumbing tape. Overall I'm very happy with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I try it sooner?
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, this economical seat was easy to install and works great. The ease of use was especially important because I got this for my kids to cut down on their excessive toilet paper use. They were excited to try it out and it brought giggles and delight... and more importantly, less toilet paper down the drain! My only wish is that Brondell would offer this product in biscuit color. I didn't want to replace a perfectly good toilet so now it's two-tone.
customer_reviews.author: cdailey

customer_reviews.title: Don't wait any longer
customer_reviews.text: Clean, clean ,clean. I wanted this model for: Hot water Non electric Reasonable priced. It was easy to install. I'm an arthritic senior woman. The instructions could have been a little more clear about where to place the washers but I got it installed in about 2 easy hours.
customer_reviews.author: msmurphy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect upgrade from other cheap bidet attachments
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bidet! I bought the cheap version in the past and broke down after a few year. These more expensive models are much better and you still don’t have to spend tons of money. Invest a little more. You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ines Gramajo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfull but Installation Issue
customer_reviews.text: The Swash S102 Bidet is wonderful. Installing the plumbing was breeze. When I attached the Mounting Plate to the Swash and it is secure and clicked, the adjustable brackets were detached from the mounting bracket ( I should have tightened the barrel nuts more). How to detach the mounting plate from the Swash after it clicks?
customer_reviews.author: AMF

customer_reviews.title: Great Warm Jet to Where it Counts!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Brondell bidet was the easiest to install! Great instructions, great quality, this bidet is so worth it - high quality all the way. Have highly recommended this model to all of my friends. Simply gets the job done. Wife also loves the front feminine nozzle. No need for one of those fancy 'hot air warmers' - this no-electricity-needed model is way simpler and absolutely works. Love the design in every way. BUY THIS - and SAVE THE ENVIRONMENT too! So glad I got it before the crazy TP hoarding during the Covid-19 crisis - now there is no need to hoard.
customer_reviews.author: AJA

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Game changer! Have wanted one for awhile, but finally took the plunge! I felt like the dad (Darren McGavin) in the movie "A Christmas Story" waiting for/unboxing his stocking-clad leg lamp, ha ha! Cold-water only is not an issue! Get one and feel better and cleaner (and forget about TP shortages, too!).
customer_reviews.author: T2IV

customer_reviews.title: Only thing I can't figure out...
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I can't figure out is why didn't we always have one of these! Its the best and we use hardly any TP now. This model has a hot water hook up but in Florida the cold water is warm. We may hook up the hot water this winter if needed. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: fshay1

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Works great, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Been meaning to try one of these for a while, and the recent 'great toilet paper shortage' inspired me to finally buy one. Glad I did! I wish I bought one years ago. Easy to install and works great. Never been so clean 'down there', LOL. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it a 5 star but, the 2nd one I ordered came in with a missing rubber pad on the toilet seat. It looked like it was a returned item with the plastic wrap already ripped open. Other than that, it seems to be working. If you can send me the rubber pad will be great.
customer_reviews.author: Dan J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bidet!
customer_reviews.text: I had been considering purchasing a bidet prior to the pandemic. Due to the limited access to TP my hand was forced. Fortunately, this bidet (being the only one in stock at the time) has worked out very well! It is easy to install and does a great job. It has reduced our toilet paper use and it keeps us fresh and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Great_North6

customer_reviews.title: So clean, so refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in a timely fahion, well packed and protected. Our nearly 80 yr old Mr. Fixit had it installed efficiently in record time. One family member dealS with urinary incontinence and beams at this safeguard to her hygiene. It is quiet, easy to clean, and gets the task done with a minimum of effort. We recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen N Kohr

customer_reviews.title: Much better than BioBidet seat it relaced.
customer_reviews.text: Fit round bowl perfectly. Not as bulky as the BioBidet. Seat is strong enough to sit on. I did add another shut off valve to ensure no unintended floods.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just received today and I had it installed in under 30 mins! Works perfectly! May I mention I am a woman and a hairstylist by trade and I installed it all by myself with zero issues or leaks. Just Follow the instructions. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great for 1 broken wrist and my other arm is hurt too. Don't know how I would have made it without this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Rutz

customer_reviews.title: very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Not a handy man here but it was easy to install took me less than 10 minutes. I like all the features. The only thing I had an issue with was if you don't get it exactly in the off position water can drip.
customer_reviews.author: sergio gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Ez bidet conversion
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty easy to install. Even though it's not heated it didn't bother me at all. My only complaint is the seat is a bit smaller than the original seat and you have to kinda position yourself for the nozzle to be most effective.
customer_reviews.author: Darin

customer_reviews.title: How did I exist before this?
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, easy to use. I actually cry at the thought of pooping anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie H.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, easy install, toddler friendly
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for us.. I picked this model because it didn’t have a big handle or knob on the side like with a lot of models that would attract curious toddler hands. Our kids hardly mess with this one. Very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install, work great!
customer_reviews.text: Being none electric, it was a quick removal of the old seat, drop on the new. A couple of minutes. Water supply had everything needed and was completed in a couple minutes. Very pleased with the operation and water pressure, and no splashing or leaking out of the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Purchased one for each bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I lived prior to getting this. This would have come in handy when I was a young lady growing up. It saves on TP and you feel so refreshed after using this. We now use less TP as a family! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: My family were very happy with with out new Brondell Swash Ecoseat Non-Electric Bidet Toilet Seat,.
customer_reviews.author: Carmelita Mattox

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat! Replaced all three of my bathroom toilet seats with these! Toilet paper use has been almost eliminated- only use to pat dry! Screw you toilet paper hoarders! #coronavirusissues
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This seat is great, hooked it up without much issue, the functionality is awesome, minimal water splatter, good control and aim, i have the elongated model. The only reason for 4 not 5 star is the creaky seat, it is a hollow bottom which makes alot of noise when you sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M

customer_reviews.title: The cat's pajamas!
customer_reviews.text: This bidet seat is so great! It is more than I had hoped. Easy installation, comfortable with unobtrusive sleek design. Works great with no leaks and has refreshing ambient water temperature. Wish I could afford another for my home and additional ones for gifts. I don't write many reviews, but this deserves one.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Mills

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the toilet seat you never knew you needed. It was simple to install, high quality materials, and very easy to use. It adds to your personal hygiene, cuts down on the amount of toilet paper used, and keeps the toilet bowl cleaner. What is not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: Mine was delivered with a faulty part. I contacted Brondell and had a replacement in a couple of days. After that the install was easy. It is a well made product with metal connections. I have been using it a few weeks and it works great. This is my 3rd bidet so far and my favorite for both ease of use and style.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great unit, well pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had it only a couple of months but we couldn’t be more pleased. Our first ever experience with a bidet and we are sold. It was fairly easy for the hubby to install. We opted, for now, not to connect the hose to the warm water, as the room temp water seems to be just fine. Maybe Winter will change that. 😉
customer_reviews.author: SkagitMama

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bidet to replace one that quit working. I was concerned about the reviews that said the power spray was too strong. For me, it’s just right. I don’t mine the lack of warm water. It does the job well. Easy to install, especially with no power needed. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MarJean Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Very easy installation. We like to function of the control knob and the results of bidet functions. Would definitely recommend! We are going to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: D. Short

customer_reviews.title: Ok for mow
customer_reviews.text: So far so good no leaks, wish you could adjust the spray valves. To fit you better. But it seams ok for now
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, works well.
customer_reviews.text: It was an easy installation. Control works well. The only complain is the seat makes a squeaky sound when you sit on the seat. I bought 2 and both have same problem.
customer_reviews.author: dbtoo

customer_reviews.title: My first bidet.  Excellent so far.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with decent instructions. Easy to use. After using it for a week, I've gotta' say I am convinced: We've been doing it wrong this whole time".
customer_reviews.author: Todd C. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to TP!
customer_reviews.text: It works well and I’m happy with it so far. We had to get extra supplies because the sink and water supply was in the opposite of the bidet hookup. However once we got it hooked up it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Keasler

customer_reviews.title: great product!  solid click knob control and not obtrusive
customer_reviews.text: had purchased one of those add on bidet inserts before and did not like. This Brondell is great! works well and was easy to install. Rated for up to 300lbs, bottom of ring is hollow, after 3 months it is holding up well. Solid click control knob. Really recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: renee

customer_reviews.title: Cleans anus
customer_reviews.text: Would have taken 10 minutes to install if I had read the directions. Instead it took 20 minutes. Powerful enough to blast those Clingons away! My brown eye thanks Brondell 🚽💩❤
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install water hose piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This is a poorly made product the hose attachment is plastic and bends easily! I don’t write too many reviews but this product is the worse and I fell like worth letting others know!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought this years ago. Easy to install. East to use. Very sturdy. Tempted to buy a second one for when the spouse pulls his back again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: It's great! I love that you don't have to have electricity to get hot water. Super easy to install and fits my American Standard toilet that I couldn't even get a bidet from them to fit my seat. This is the third one I have installed and it's my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Emilucass

customer_reviews.title: works great, creaky to sit on
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy install, cold water t'aint bad. My only complaint is that the plastic creaks a lot when I sit on it. C'mon, man, I'm not THAT heavy.
customer_reviews.author: charles_atx

customer_reviews.title: Still using as much toliet paper. Like the concept.
customer_reviews.text: Think we probably got what we paid for but don't like the plastic vs a wood seat. Functionality needs getting use to...aim not happening yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy install. My wife and I have used ZERO toilet paper since installing this Bidet. Cut up some old towels into small squares for drying off, have a small trash can to put them in, laundry those once a week. Wonderful environmental product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Walker

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Can’t tell it’s a bidet.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Can’t tell its a bidet. Good pre and post cleaning of nozzles. Good alternative between front and rear cleaning. Perfect for male and females.
customer_reviews.author: A and D

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs a bidet. Easy to install and you don’t have to worry about that annoying gap like other bidets. It cleans the front and back.
customer_reviews.author: BeautifulTee

customer_reviews.title: Good seat but the knobs are not labeled
customer_reviews.text: The seat works well. My only issue is the knobs. Y9u just have to know which way to turn it. There's no label. You can't see where the temperature is set either.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just in time!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this before the Coronavirus resulted in toilet paper hoarding. It came just in time. Super easy to install and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First timer...I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time having a deb and I will never be without one. It spray just right, feels secure and I don't mind the cold water. It feels refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Craft

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet paper saver and in this critical time of shortages that is a real blessing
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase this year, a bright spot in an otherwise dismal year. I have been recommending it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cecchini

customer_reviews.title: Clean as a whistle!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our home in replace of the attachment type bidet. This is so much nicer!!! I had such a hard time cleaning around the attachment, so to have it built directly into the seat is a dream. With the different water temperature options and front and back cleaning, you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hudak

customer_reviews.title: Do your starfish a favor.
customer_reviews.text: Remember that summer you rode the 50 foot high waterslide. This thing is wet and wild. I had the ride of my life. The starfish is never been cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: dustin frank

customer_reviews.title: Good investment.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Comfortable seating. Works well love being able to control pressure and water temperature.
customer_reviews.author: SCooper

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the way it works. was easy to install. The main reason we bought this specific bidet seat was that is had the water hose connections on the right side. This was better for us because you see the left side of the toilet when coming into the bathroom. Having the water connections on the right side of this seat hides the hose attaching to the seat better.
customer_reviews.author: Dan T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of this item.. Must have product. Fast shipping. Trusted seller. Would buy again. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA S.

customer_reviews.title: Brondell bidet rocks!
customer_reviews.text: First bidet. I should have never waited so long!! Our septic system will appreciate this as well. Thank you Brondell!! Great quality and no electricity or batteries required... +++++
customer_reviews.author: M Grays

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was Very hesitant to buy anything like this. Mainly because the market is so flooded with them. However, I absolutely Love mine! The water pressure works great, connects to warm/cold water, no electricity is needed. Get me clean every time!
customer_reviews.author: THuff

customer_reviews.title: I guess I'm now civilized
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be easier to install. I am 62 years old and never new what I was missing. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Great for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Enjoy the fresh clean feeling. Only set back is my hot water takes a few seconds to heat up...so I run the the faucet for a few seconds so it the warm water mixes with the cold then in the bidet. That could just be my sinks problem not necessarily the products flaw. So 4 stars for price and easy installation!
customer_reviews.author: Mamadoolittle

customer_reviews.title: Bidet
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Nice and simple design. Still have to use a little TP to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Must have, great worthy buy!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend for every household. Awesome sturdy product. Extremely easy to install... took all of 20 min. Really could take less. Works better than espected! Will buy again for properties.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Should have purchased sooner
customer_reviews.text: The bidet seat was easy to install and works perfectly. The warm water feature is extra nice. This works as well as those experienced in overseas travel. The only limitation is the fixed "aiming position" which may require some repositioning by the user. Not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy F Bacha

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy; the toilet lid bidet works as advertised; has solved a ongoing issue
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hight quality product that performs well.
customer_reviews.text: The Brondell Swash Ecoseat is constructed of high quality materials and is fairly easy to install. But, I did have to replace the existing rigid metal water supply line with a flexible stainless steel water supply line in order to install the Ecoseat. Although there is a little learning curve, the Ecoseat performs it's function very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really gets up in there!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is easy to install and very durable. It really gets up in there! Once you experience the clean crack you'll never go back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and hygienic!
customer_reviews.text: This bidet is super easy to install and the stream is very comfortable and not harsh like other bidets. It is a little more expensive than others, but I think it's worth it. The best part about it is that the nozzles clean themselves before and after each wash. Genius.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah McNeely

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the old type no seat, love it easy install
customer_reviews.author: havanajohn

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works great , long hose lets water be room temperature
customer_reviews.author: JimD

customer_reviews.title: Tough install - no fault of the seat.
customer_reviews.text: Check you tank inlet! Mine required pulling the toilet and adding a longer supply so it wouldn’t link.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Wilson

product_meta.title: Brondell Swash Ecoseat Non-Electric Bidet Toilet Seat, Fits Elongated Toilets, White - Dual Temperature, Dual Nozzle System - Bidet with Easy Installation
product_meta.description: Style:Elongated| Size:S102Join the Wash Don’t Wipe Revolution! The Brondell Swash EcoSeat 102 is an intuitive, user-friendly non-electronic dual temperature bidet toilet seat that is designed to deliver the most hygienic bathroom experience and a warm water wash without the need for electrical outlets, electrical cords, or batteries. Designed to fit elongated toilets, this bidet also features a dual nozzle system with adjustable water pressure. With both rear and front washes, the nozzle can be positioned to your liking for a soothing, freshwater wash that leaves you feeling clean and rejuvenated. The Brondell Swash EcoSeat 102 is a budget-friendly bidet toilet seat that’s designed for the modern North American bathroom. This bidet’s sleek shape blends seamlessly into both your bathroom decor and bathroom habits. The ergonomic seat, slow closing lid, and the textured chrome dial accent add an elegant touch to your new home spa experience. This Brondell bidet toilet seat measures 20. 03” x 14. 25” x 2. 55” and requires no batteries or electricity making it convenient for installation. With a few simple steps, it's easy to self-install in under an hour—no plumbers necessary! Technology never felt so clean. Water cleans in a way that paper can’t. Since 2003, Brondell has been making bidets and bidet attachments that give you that fresh, clean, and hygienic feeling after you “go”. This seat makes it easy to stay clean and green!
feature_bullets: CLEAN AND REFRESHING: With Brondell’s Ecoseat 101 Bidet, you’ll experience a soothing, freshwater wash that leaves you feeling clean and rejuvenated. Plus, this economical bidet requires no electricity or batteries.
DUAL TEMPERATURE: Choose between a warm or ambient water wash and enjoy features like a dual nozzle system for both rear and front washes, a gentle closing seat, and sittable lid.
EASY INSTALLATION: This elongated bidet toilet seat measures 20. 03” x 14. 25” x 2. 55” and can easily be self-installed in minutes—no plumbers necessary!

WARM WATER WITHOUT ELECTRICITY: For a warm water wash, use the included 81” hot water flex pipe to connect with a nearby faucet water supply. The included pipe is specifically designed for high temperature and high pressure, do NOT substitute.
VERSATILE STYLE: This bidet fits elongated toilets and looks great in any bathroom. The textured chrome dial accent adds an elegant touch to your new home spa experience.

specifications.Included Components: Mounting plate, mounting hardware, bidet hose, user manual
specifications.Warranty Description: 1 year limited manufacturer's warranty when purchased from an authorized seller
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars388 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
